title: Adjust Lighting Based on Occupancy
description: In a city office building, an operator links occupancy sensors to the lighting system to automatically turn off lights in empty rooms.

tasks.description: Identify a room where occupancy sensors show it has been vacant for over 15 minutes, but lights are still on.
Create a rule in the Building Management System to link the occupancy sensor to the room's lighting controls.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates an automation rule.

tasks.description: Verify the rule works by observing that the lights automatically turn off.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the automation is working as intended.
